tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is wonderful in diagnosis of children, she prescribe the medicine which is required. For all type of treatment of my kid I go to her* *** ** **** ** **** ****** I can recommend her any time to any body. I always seek her advice for my kid. Thank you madam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
She has a very calming influence on the child. My baby is usually doctor shy and doesn't like them touching at all, but Dr. Kirthini got my baby all involved with her talk and she also listened to us patiently and waited for us to ask our questions.

She knows what she is doing and was very assuring as well. She explained about the food restrictions and how the problem can be avoided etc etc.

I would definitely recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** **** ****** **** ***** Very friendly, lots of lots of patience, never rush but spends lot of time with each patient, Takes great care of kids.  Glad that we found someone like Mrs. Kirtini in Madinaguda, we've been visiting her clinic since last 1 year.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I have been visiting this doctor for both of my kids from the last 6 years. *** ** *** **** ****** ** ******** *** never visited second time for the same problem. She gives quality time for all patients and very friendly. 
-Ves: waiting time is more. Mosquito problem some times.  But still, I strongly recommend this doctor ** * ***** *** ** *** **** ** **** ** *** *****

Visited for motion prb for 5 year kid.
*** ********* ** ********* **** limited medicine but the problem is for one patient sje will take 30 minutes. We have waited for 3 hours to get our turn and they don't consider the Practo booking. It's first come first serve basis. I did not understand why 30 min required....
Doctor is nice and genuine to heart. Knows her stuff well. Follows rule and regulations for vaccinations.

I had visited 29/12/16 for my 6 months old baby who has cold problem. Doctor kirtini treated very well and listened up all issues and suggested drops . We had used and my baby is sleeping with out any cold problem now.
At frist her way of talking and listening cures the patient by 50% rest her treatment is also to the point and best
She is friendly  as well as professional... explained well the issue.* * ****** ********* *** *********** ********* straight to the issue n made it clear in simple way..

review: Dr.kirthini is very gud natured doctor .patiently listens and understands our problem and solves in a very simple way .she guides parents very well and respects every individuals.i am very happy and comfortable to share every problem of my baby with her and improve myself as a mother .and I am very sure that every patient will be satisfied with her treatment.thank you
Doctor gave good medicine for my daughter who was having cold and headache. Definitely recommend the doctor.
There was no stock for a particular vaccine. She tried arranging immediately and asked to come later in the evening. She listened to all our questions patiently.

Went for my kid checkup and She is very cool and takes lot of time to interact with the kid to diagnose the actual problem and explains the cause, treatment and medication to us in detail. I would highly recommend her
Very nice doctor .explained the condition very clearly.i recommended .consulting fee also 300 only..

She is very good and definitely recommendable .. I visited for my son (3y 4m older) , who was suffering with fever, cough and snoring (may be adenoids) problem frequently since last 8 months ... 

She understood the medical history properly and then prescribed medicine.

Thanks to Dr. Kirthini ...
I highly recommend this doctor for children's health illness . She listens and ask questions and diagnose well.
Very friendly with the kid and very patient .Kid also loved the doctor.. Nice...Go for it....very good...excellent

review: Very good and detail oriented doctor, spends quality time with each patient, unlike other few doctors who are eager to see as many patients as possible. Explains in detail, about the symptoms, medications.
**** ************ *** *** **** **** ******** should be based on appointment basis, also expected clean mosquito free zone for visitors
